name: C3-PRO “Consumer”
short: Daemon that runs in-house, consumes from the “receiver”'s SQS queue and decrypts 🔥FHIR resources.
description: Daemon that runs in-house with highly limited access. Consumes from the “receiver”'s SQS queue, decrypts the 🔥FHIR resources and sends them into i2b2 using the newly created C3-PRO FHIR i2b2 cell. To ensure that all data is recorded properly, encrypted raw data is also stored in-house as BLOB.
